welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Martinez, where small-town charm meets big-city opportunities! Known for its historic downtown and scenic waterfront, we invite you to explore and experience all that our beautiful city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Buchanan Field Airport handles all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: General Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: The general aviation terminal at Buchanan Field Airport serves private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: This terminal serves all regional and commuter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Executive Airport serves both commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Executive Airport caters to private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Napa County Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: Main terminal for domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: Terminal for low-cost carriers and regional flights.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport and is free for all passengers.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Travis AFB Airport serves both civilian and military passengers.

terminals.name: Military Terminal
terminals.description: The military terminal at Travis AFB Airport is used exclusively by military personnel and their families.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Livermore Airport offers a variety of amenities for travelers including a cafe, gift shop, and rental car services.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Livermore Airport caters to private and corporate flights, offering a luxurious lounge and concierge services.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The oldest terminal at SFO, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: Recently renovated terminal with modern amenities and a variety of dining options.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: The largest terminal at SFO, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: International Terminal
terminals.description: Serving all international flights, with a variety of duty-free shops and restaurants.

wifi.note: Limited free WiFi access is available throughout the airport. Premium options are also available for purchase.
